conversation.speaker: River
conversation.text: Can you tell me more about the clothes you sell?

conversation.speaker: Gypsum
conversation.text: Of course! We have a wide variety of clothes for different styles and occasions. Each type of clothing has its own unique properties that can give you special abilities.

conversation.speaker: River
conversation.text: Really? Can you give me an example?

conversation.speaker: Gypsum
conversation.text: Sure. For example, we have a special type of cloak that is made from the feathers of a Phoenix. When worn, it grants the wearer the ability to control fire.

conversation.speaker: River
conversation.text: That's amazing! What other types of clothes do you have?

conversation.speaker: Gypsum
conversation.text: We have a wide range of clothes, from armor made from dragon scales that grant the wearer the ability to breathe fire, to a suit made from spider silk that allows the wearer to climb walls and ceilings.

conversation.speaker: River
conversation.text: That's incredible. I'll definitely have to take a look.

conversation.speaker: Gypsum
conversation.text: I'd be happy to help you find something that fits your style and needs. Each type of clothing has unique properties that can give you special abilities, and I'll make sure you find something that's perfect for you.
